sentences.sContent: However, if you want to wear a print, choose a print that's low in contrast and monochromatic in color.
sentences.sContent_eng: However, if you want to wear a print, choose a print that's low in contrast and monochromatic in color.
sentences.sCn: 然而，假如你实在想穿喷绘衣服，那就选择一件单色、低对比度的。

sentences.sContent: This hologram, if later illuminated with the same wavelength of laser light, reproduced a 3D (but monochromatic) image of the object.
sentences.sContent_eng: This hologram, if later illuminated with the same wavelength of laser light, reproduced a 3D (but monochromatic) image of the object.
sentences.sCn: 这幅全息图，如果用（与拍摄时）相同波长的激光照明，会再现出物体的3D图象（不过是单色的）。

trans.tranOther: (of light or other electromagnetic radiation) having only one wavelength
